Feats-Skill-Medicine -- Female Half-Elf Ranger: 2
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium

Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 7 from any)
Battle Medicine: (1) May use Medicine to restore Hit Points 1/target/day
Continual Recovery: May repeat Treat Wounds on a patient after 10 min
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Hunt Prey: (1) +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track designated creature
Legendary Medic: May use a 1 hour process and a successful Medicine check to remove a disease or condition 1/target/day
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Robust Recovery: Success on Treat a Disease or a Poison gives a +4 bonus/Patient success is always a critical success
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Ward Medic: May use Medicine to Treat Disease or Treat Wounds on up to 2 creatures simultaneously
